features.name: Sitemap URL Generation
features.description: Generates 51 test sitemap URLs (page_0.aspx through page_50.aspx) with configurable properties for testing purposes.
features.ui_location: Accessible via sitemap.aspx or sitemap.xml endpoint when provider is registered
test_scenarios: Verify GetUrls returns exactly 51 URLs
Verify URL format follows pattern http://mysite/page_{index}.aspx
Verify all URLs have priority set to 0.5
Verify all URLs have ChangeFrequency set to Daily
Verify LastModified is set to current date/time
Test with different portal IDs
Test with null PortalSettings
Test with different version parameters
Verify provider inherits from SitemapProvider correctly

features.name: Provider Registration
features.description: Registration of BigSitemapProvider as a sitemap provider in the DNN/Evoq platform.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Search Engine Site Map (provider selection)
test_scenarios: Verify provider appears in available sitemap providers list
Verify provider can be selected as active sitemap provider
Verify assembly loads correctly
Test provider activation/deactivation
Verify provider name displays correctly in UI

features.name: Sitemap XML Output
features.description: Generation of valid XML sitemap output conforming to sitemap protocol standards.
test_scenarios: Verify XML output is well-formed
Verify sitemap protocol compliance
Test URL encoding in XML output
Verify all 51 URLs appear in XML output
Test XML namespace declarations
Verify lastmod date format (W3C Datetime)
Verify changefreq values are valid
Verify priority values are between 0.0 and 1.0
Test large sitemap performance with 51 URLs
Test caching behavior if implemented

features.name: Multi-Portal Support
features.description: Support for generating sitemaps for different portals in a multi-portal DNN/Evoq installation.
test_scenarios: Test with different portal IDs (0, 1, -1, null)
Verify portal isolation (no cross-portal URL leakage)
Test with different PortalSettings configurations
Verify portal-specific URL generation if applicable
